CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: BHJ PSCs with PffBBn : PC71BM active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures showed considerably various photovoltaic performance because of the morphological order change of the blend layer at different processing temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

1. BHJ PSCs (Blends of High Performance Organic Semiconductors in Polymer Solar Cells)
2. PffBBn (type of polymer, possibly a host material)
3. PC71BM (type of organic semiconductor, possibly a guest material in the active blend layer)

These are the material names identified in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BHJ PSCs (Blends of High Performance Organic Semiconductors in Polymer Solar Cells)
2. PC71BM

These are the material names that are clearly mentioned in the paragraph. PffBBn is mentioned as a type of polymer, but it's not explicitly stated that it is a material name, so it is not included in the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs (Blends of High Performance Organic Semiconductors in Polymer Solar Cells) |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: BHJ PSCs with PffBBn : PC71BM active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures showed considerably various photovoltaic performance because of the morphological order change of the blend layer at different processing temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

1. BHJ PSCs (Blends of High Performance Organic Semiconductors in Polymer Solar Cells)
2. PffBBn (type of material, possibly a polymer or a surfactant with the prefix Pff and the suffix BBn)
3. PC71BM (type of material, a specific organic semiconductor)
4. Temperatures (physical property)
5. Photovoltaic performance (performance property of the solar cells)
6. Morphological order (structural property of the blend layer)
7. Blend layer (material property, specifically the active layer in the solar cells)
8. Processing temperatures (process parameter)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PC71BM (specific organic semiconductor)
2. Blend layer (active layer in the solar cells)
3. Morphological order (structural property of the blend layer)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM (specific organic semiconductor) |
| Blend layer (active layer in the solar cells) |
| Morphological order (structural property of the blend layer) |

Paragraph: BHJ PSCs with PffBBn : PC71BM active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures showed considerably various photovoltaic performance because of the morphological order change of the blend layer at different processing temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

1. BHJ PSCs (Blends of High Performance Organic Semiconductors in Polymer Solar Cells)
2. PffBBn (Type of polymer or additive, possibly a surfactant or a binder)
3. PC71BM (Organic semiconductor material, a specific blend component)
4. Temperatures (Numerical values representing the processing temperature)
5. Photovoltaic performance (Overall efficiency or effectiveness of the solar cell in converting light into electricity)
6. Morphological order (Structure or arrangement of the components within the blend layer)
7. Processing temperatures (Same as above, but mentioned again for clarity)
